Headline: Red Line Trains bypassing 69th/Dan Ryan Station
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at 69th/Dan Ryan station due to a police investigation.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at 69th/Dan Ryan station due to a police investigation.

  • Shuttle buses are available from 63rd/Dan Ryan to 79th/Dan Ryan to provide connecting service in both directions.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

  • #29 State
  • #30 South Chicago
  • #67 67th/69th/71st 
  • #71 71st/South Shore 

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. 

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near 69th Red Line
ShortDescription: Southbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 69th, Lafayette, then resume their normal route due to police activity at 69th Red Line.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 69th, Lafayette, then resume their normal route due to police activity at 69th Red Line.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Northbound Reroute near 69th Red Line
ShortDescription: Northbound 30 South Chicago buses are rerouted via 69th, Lafayette (wait recovery time), then resume their normal route, due to police activity at 69th Red Line

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via 69th, Lafayette (wait recovery time), then resume their normal route, due to police activity at 69th Red Line.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
